summary: The diff adds a quiz UI, theme styles, and a Motoko question bank, but key requirements around the generated image asset location and backend payload/scoring constraints are not evidenced. It also introduces Internet Identity login plumbing, which is explicitly a non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend method returns quiz questions without exposing correct answers to the client.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend MCQ type includes `correctAnswerIndex`, and the frontend queries `actor.getQuestions()` as `MCQ[]`. There is no evidence (in the provided diff summary) of a separate client-safe question type or filtering/removal of correct answers in the questions payload.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend method accepts submitted answers and returns a computed final score out of 50.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows frontend calling `actor.submitAnswers(answers)` and treating the result as a number, but the backend implementation of `submitAnswers` and any scaling to a score out of 50 is not shown in the provided truncated backend file excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated static image asset exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and is displayed in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references `/assets/generated/history-quiz-banner.dim_1600x400.png`, but the diff summary does not show the image file being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (or anywhere).

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity (AuthClient) integration/provider and identity-based actor creation.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/Internet Identity login as a non-goal, but the diff adds `useInternetIdentity`, wraps the app in `InternetIdentityProvider`, and creates authenticated/anonymous actors depending on identity.
